Name: Iron Fusion Stage 1!
Rules: Decrease all attack damage received by 1 while activated.

Name: Iron Fusion Stage 2!
Rules: (Iron Fusion Stage 1! must be activated) Inflict damage +1 while activated.

Name: Iron Fusion Stage 3 - Ayzn Black!
Rules: (Iron Fusion Stage 2! must be activated) Increase attack roll results by 1 while activated.

Name: Detonator Overload
Rules: While Activated, if your Melee Attack card was successful, you may permanently remove it from the game to Trigger: You may spend X Power Dice to add +X damage to this attack.

Name: Titan's Stride
Rules: While Activated, when you spend your movement, you move through and destroy Structures by receiving 2 Damage. You must always end your movement past the Structure’s hex. Do not resolve the Impact Rules on Impact Cards drawn for Structures destroyed this way.

Name: Iron Fusion Override
Rules: You may receive 1 Fire to Trigger: You may play any “Ayzn Black” cards without having “Iron Fusion Stage 3-Ayzn Black” Activated, until the end of this turn.

Name: Thunder Clap
Rules: Pay 2 Fighting Spirit to move a Power Surge from your Cooldown Meter to this Ability. Remove Six Power Surges on this ability to Trigger: You may play any 1 card for free.

Name: Ion Shield
Rules: Remove 3 Power Surges from your Cooldown Meter to Trigger: Create 1 Barrier.

Name: Double Dagger
Rules: While Activated, you may re-roll your unsuccessful Melee attack rolls once.

Name: Storm of Strikes
Rules:
WHILE ACTIVATED, YOU MAY REMOVE 1 POWER SURGE FROM YOUR 
COOLDOWN METER DURING ANY OPPONENT’S COOLDOWN PHASE TO 
TRIGGER: DECREASE your COMBO CARDs BY 1 cooldown slot.

Name: Arc Wing
Rules: While Activated, gain Boost.

Name: Ion Exhaust
Rules: Spend 2 Power Token to Trigger: Remove all Power Surges from your Cooldown Meter.

Name: Chogoking Sabre
Rules: While Activated, Increase the Maximum Range of your Melee Attacks by 1.

Name: Phoenix Wing Reborn
Rules: If “Chogoking Sabre” is Activated, you may Deactivate it to Trigger: Gain Boost until the end of this turn.

Name: Blazing Aegis
Rules: While Activated, if you are adjacent to an opponent at the end of their turn, Trigger: Inflict 1 Fire to all Adjacent opponents

Name: Trace Burn
Rules: While Activated, whenever you receive Fire, increase the amount by 1.

Name: Aegis Fire
Rules: While Activated, increase your Defense by 1.

Name: Magma Breach
Rules: While Activated, gain 1 Power Token whenever you receive Fire damage

Name: Anchor Shield
Rules: When damage is Inflicted to you, you may pay 2 Fighting Spirit to place any 1 card that inflicts Anchors into Cooldown, Deactivated, to Trigger: Reduce Inflicted by 3.

Name: Burst Anchor
Rules: While you are the Active Player, whenever you are adjacent to an Anchored  hex, you may PAY 3 Power Tokens to Trigger: LEAP to any hex adjacent to any Anchored hex.

Name: Star Spanner Sacrifice
Rules:
If “Star Spanner” is Activated, you may Deactivate it  and pay X Fighting Spirit to 
Trigger: reduce damage inflicted to you by your Opponent’s Ranged Attack by X.

Name: Star Spanner
Rules: While Activated, your Melee Attack Cards inflict +1 damage.

Name: Cosmos Shield
Rules: You may spend 2 Power Tokens to Trigger: Create 1 Barrier.

Name: Sky Anchor Overload
Rules: Spend 3 Power Tokens to trigger: All Anchors inflict 3 damage and are then destroyed.

Name: Heart Of The Wolf
Rules: Spend 2 Power Tokens to Trigger: X=the amount of Panic in your Cooldown Meter. Gain  X⋅2 Fighting Spirit.

Name: Leap Of The Wolf
Rules: Pay 3 Fighting Spirit and remove 1 Panic from your Cooldown Meter to Trigger: You may Leap 1 hex even if you have already spent your movement this turn.

Name: Jaws Of The Wolf
Rules: While Activated, you may replace the Rules Text of a Fang Attack Card with the rules text of any other Fang Attack  Card in your Cooldown Meter.

Name: Bite Of The Wolf
Rules: Once per attack, you may gain 1 Panic to Trigger: Reroll your unsuccessful Fang attack.

Name: Hunger Of The Wolf
Rules: While Activated, when you start your turn with Combat Advantage increase your Speed by 2.

Name: Wolfsbane
Rules: While Activated, once per turn you may spend 1 Power Token to Trigger: Create 1 Barrier.

Name: Rocket Sprint
Rules:
While Activated, on your Active Turn you may spend X Power TOKENS
to TRIGGER: move X hexes, even if you have already spent your movement this turn.

Name: Sniper's Perch
Rules: While Activated, whenever you have Combat Advantage add 2 Attack Dice to your Attack Roll instead of 1.

Name: Cover Shooter
Rules: While Activated, whenever you’re in Cover, add 1 Defense Die to your Attack Rolls, treating it as a 10-sided Attack Die.

Name: Bullet Hell
Rules: Spend 5 Power Tokens to Trigger: All of your Ranged Attack Cards Gain the Combo subtype until the end of this turn

Name: Spotter
Rules: Spend 3 Power Tokens to Trigger: All of your Attack Die results are increased by 1 until the end of this turn.

Name: Sniper Gust
Rules: Spend 1 Power Token to Trigger: Gain Boost until the end of this turn.
